Class AssemblyStationTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • piazzapanictests.tests.MasterTestClass

extends MasterTestClass
    Tests for the assembly station.
    Author:
    Jack Vickers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void placeFinishedMealsThenRemoveThem()
      Tests that complete meals can be placed on an assembly station and then successfully removed from it.
      void testInvalidCombination()
      Tests that items from different recipes cannot be combined on an assembly station.
      void testItemLimit()
      Tests that an assembly station can hold a maximum of 4 items.
      void testPickupItem()
      Tests that an item can be successfully removed from the station.
      void testPickupWhenEmpty()
      Tests that nothing happens when an item is attempted to be removed from an empty assembly station.
      void testPlaceItem()
      Tests that an item can be placed on an assembly station.
      void testPlaceItemAfterCombining()
      Tests that items can be placed on an assembly station after other items have been combined on this station.
      void testSaveAndLoad()
      Tests that the assembly station data can be saved and loaded correctly.
      void testValidCombinations()
      Tests that all valid combinations of items can be combined on an assembly station.

        Tests that nothing happens when an item is attempted to be removed from an empty assembly station.

      • testPlaceItemAfterCombining

        public void testPlaceItemAfterCombining()
        Tests that items can be placed on an assembly station after other items have been combined on this station. Also tests that they can all be successfully removed from the station.

      • placeFinishedMealsThenRemoveThem

        public void placeFinishedMealsThenRemoveThem()
        Tests that complete meals can be placed on an assembly station and then successfully removed from it.

        public void testItemLimit()
        Tests that an assembly station can hold a maximum of 4 items.

      • testInvalidCombination

        public void testInvalidCombination()
        Tests that items from different recipes cannot be combined on an assembly station.

      • testValidCombinations

        public void testValidCombinations()
        Tests that all valid combinations of items can be combined on an assembly station.

      • testSaveAndLoad

        public void testSaveAndLoad()
        Tests that the assembly station data can be saved and loaded correctly.
